titles: Septemb. 6. 1643. At the Committee of Lords and Commons for advance of money and other necessaries for the Army.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: An order respecting the collection of the weekly assessment.
Signed: Martin Dallison, Clerke to the said Committee.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
